Content:

Author: logic_anarchy

Author: logic_anarchy
Content:
The FPGA design targets multiple boards.

ASIC  and ULX3s  differs  only in the top-level  module.
The underlying hierarchy remains identical in behavior.

Author: logic_anarchy
Content: I need only 32MiB SDRAM, I could built top for ARTIX7, ecp5, cyclone, gatemate, ...

Author: mithro_
Content: I had a video chat with @GoranMahovlic a while back and he offered to help with supplying the ulx3s for https://fpgas.online and wafer.space related stuff

Author: logic_anarchy
Content: Do you want ASIC-like behavior, or can I optimize it further? I can add more cache (more ways), more TLBs, and still clock it at 70 MHz on the ECP5.
